name: D-Factory
short_description:
D-Factory will re-invent the Manufacturing Execution System (MES), scaled down to small, simple manufacturing operations.
We build on existing industry knowledge of (big) MES systems, keeping only the characteristics that are useful in smaller operation

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
